t: Amazon.com: Bully Lock Bully Grip Lock - Yellow (132255) : Automotive
s: This item is fantastic. I assume this is made by the same company that makes the official "Grip Lock" as they are from the same area. I initially was going to buy the "brand name," but didn't feel like paying the higher price AND 20$ shipping. I settled for the Bully Lock at 45$ and free shipping.
